name: ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT is an advanced AI assistant developed by OpenAI that can engage in conversations, answer questions, help with writing tasks, provide explanations on various topics, assist with coding, and much more. Built on the GPT architecture, it leverages deep learning to understand context and generate human-like responses across a wide range of domains.
shortDescription: Advanced AI assistant for conversations, writing, and problem-solving across various domains.
pros: Great for creative writing and brainstorming

name: Midjourney
description: Midjourney is a powerful AI image generation tool that creates stunning, artistic images from text descriptions. Using advanced machine learning algorithms, it can produce highly detailed artwork, concept art, photorealistic images, and creative designs in various artistic styles. Popular among artists, designers, and content creators.
shortDescription: Create stunning, artistic images from text descriptions using advanced AI art generation.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered code completion tool developed by GitHub and OpenAI. It acts as a virtual pair programmer, suggesting code completions, entire functions, and even complex algorithms as you type. Trained on billions of lines of public code, it supports multiple programming languages and integrates seamlessly with popular IDEs.
shortDescription: AI-powered code completion and generation tool that helps developers write code faster.

name: Notion AI
description: Notion AI is an intelligent writing assistant integrated directly into Notion workspaces. It helps users write, edit, summarize, and brainstorm content within their existing Notion pages. From creating meeting summaries to generating creative content, Notion AI enhances productivity by providing AI-powered assistance for various writing tasks.
shortDescription: AI-powered writing assistant integrated into Notion for better productivity and content creation.

name: Runway
description: Runway is a comprehensive AI-powered creative platform that offers tools for video editing, image generation, and multimedia content creation. It provides cutting-edge machine learning models for tasks like background removal, object tracking, style transfer, and AI video generation, making advanced creative techniques accessible to creators of all levels.
shortDescription: AI-powered video editing and generation platform for creating stunning visual content.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper is an AI writing assistant specifically designed for marketing and business content creation. It excels at generating blog posts, ad copy, social media content, emails, and other marketing materials. With templates for various content types and the ability to maintain brand voice, Jasper is a popular choice for marketers and content teams.
shortDescription: AI writing assistant that helps create high-quality content for marketing and business needs.
